question: I have pain on right lower side, only after sleeping on that side. I had gallbladder out 7 yrs ago this pain just started 6 months ago. It goes away after a few minutes after I wake. Hurts to bend or twist. Only happens when I sleep on that right side. No diabetes. Do have bladder issues I think with frequent urination. Any ideas?
title: Lower right side pain after sleeping on it.
